section.title: Introduction
section.para: The purpose of this documentation is to describe how to use the virtual appliance which embeds Ulteo Open Virtual Desktop components such as Session Manager, Web Portal Java/HTML5, FileServer and Linux Application Server

section.title: Installation
section.para: OVD Virtual appliance works with both VMware or VirtualBox. For easy setup, use a dhcp network with a bridged interface on your host machine configuration.

section.title: VMWare Installation
section.para: You can use for demo VMWare Player.
Once launched, import your ova file into VMWare Player
OVD Virtual appliance is now running !

section.title: VirtualBox Installation
section.para: You can use for demo VirtualBox.
Once launched, import your ova file into VirtualBox
By default, VirtualBox fails to assign an network interface. You need to update it into the Virtual Machine settings
Open the settings box and validate by clicking on OK
OVD Virtual appliance is now running !

section.title: Run it !
section.para: Quite easy to use, the OVD Virtual appliance allows you to quickly get an idea of what is OVD and how this works. Check you shell console to get the IP
Web Portal settings and how to use it is available here
Once run, you should have access on an OVD demo farm. Go to http://vapp.test.demo
